_sov_compliance_covenant.scripture_foundation: 1 Thessalonians 5:21 - Prove all things; hold fast that which is good
_sov_compliance_covenant.secondary_scripture: 1 Corinthians 4:2 - Moreover it is required in stewards, that a man be found faithful
_sov_compliance_covenant.christ_centered_purpose: These test results exist to validate that our sacred automation serves Christ's Kingdom with excellence and faithfulness, ensuring no component operates contrary to Scripture or divine character.
_sov_compliance_covenant.testing_consecration: Lord Jesus Christ, we present these test results as an offering of faithful stewardship. Let every successful test glorify You, and let every failure teach us to depend more fully on Your wisdom. May this testing serve to purify and strengthen Your work, not to prove human capability. We consecrate these validation processes to Your service and Kingdom advancement. In Your name, Amen.
_sov_compliance_covenant.sola_scriptura_validation: All test criteria and success metrics must align with Biblical principles of faithfulness, stewardship, and Kingdom service rather than mere technical performance
_sov_compliance_covenant.divine_peace_confirmation: The Holy Spirit bears witness that these tests serve to validate Kingdom-aligned automation, not human pride or efficiency worship
_sov_compliance_covenant.gabriel_architecture_note: Integrated testing under Gabriel's unified system design for Biblical automation serving disciple formation
